original_title: Sri Lanka bond yields end higher, rupee at 317.90/318.50
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s bond yields were slightly up at close on Monday, while the rupee opened at 317.90/318.50 against the US dollar in the spot market, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 closed at 28.00/30 percent, slightly up from 27.90/28.00 percent.
The rupee closed at 317.50/318.50 against the US dollar in the spot market appreciated from the last close at 319.00/40. (Colombo/May08/2023)
